data.title: Kent State University
data.meta_description: Student Staff List Academic Success Center | ï»¿ p { font-weight: 400; } a.anchor { position: relative; top: -150px; } .anchor { content: " "; margin-top: -325px; padding-top: 325px; } h2.display { font-size: 3em; line-height: 1.25em; font-family: "NationalBlackItalic","Helvetica Neue",Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; color: #2c8ece; } .hrHalf { width: 100%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; border-width: 2px 0 0; margin-bottom: 3rem; } span.kentBlue { color: #003976; } span.kentGold { color: #efab00; } .question { font-family: "NationalBlackItalic","
data.text:
Bella Alejars

I am studying: Nutrition and Dietetics

I started working with ASC in: Fall 2022

My role with ASC: Tutor

What do you want to do after college?

What other campus and professional activities are you involved in? Include any officer/leadership positions you hold.

Share an interesting or fun fact about yourself.

I enjoy working out and hanging out with friends.

Write one sentence about why you love being a part of ASC.

Josh Andrews

I am studying: Actuarial Sciences

I started working with ASC in: Spring 2022

My role with ASC: Tutor

What do you want to do after college?

After college I plan to become an actuary. I would also like to pass as many tests as I can in my field in order to become more diverse and knowledgeable in my subject matter.

What other campus and professional activities are you involved in? Include any officer/leadership positions you hold.

I am involved in the Choose Ohio First Program.

Share an interesting or fun fact about yourself.

I have visited 18 of the 30 MLB stadiums and plan to visit them all on day.

Write one sentence about why you love being a part of ASC.

I enjoy helping students in order for them to become successful in the field that they are studying.

Bri Bish

I am studying: Biology Pre-med

I started working with ASC in: Fall 2019

My role with ASC: Tutor, Classroom Assistant, Mentor, Program Assistant, CRLA Level I Certified Tutor

What do you want to do after college?

I want to go to medical school to become a physician in a pediatric specialty.

What other campus and professional activities are you involved in? Include any officer/leadership positions you hold.

I am a mentor for the Honors Leadership Academy, a student ambassador for the University College, a member of the honors peer to peer mentor program, a member of AMSA and Phi Delta Epsilon.

Share an interesting or fun fact about yourself.

Write one sentence about why you love being a part of ASC.

I love being able to help students feel more confident in their ability to succeed in their coursework.

I am studying: Middle Childhood Education

N/A

Share an interesting or fun fact about yourself.

I can play the flute and the piccolo!

Write one sentence about why you love being a part of ASC.

I love being able to help people grow and see them succeed.

I am studying: Biology major, French minor

My role with ASC: Tutor

What other campus and professional activities are you involved in? Include any officer/leadership positions you hold.

Share an interesting or fun fact about yourself.

I love spending time in nature and going on walks, looking at clouds, and just enjoying the sunshine!

Write one sentence about why you love being a part of ASC.

I love connecting with my peers through learning STEM!

I have three beagles that I love to play with when I am home.

Nuried Hurtado

I am studying: Journalism major and Digital Media Production minor

I started working with ASC in: Fall 2021

My role with ASC: Tutor, Academic Coach

What do you want to do after college?

I would love to work as a reporter or an anchor in a news show. It is something I am looking forward once I graduate

What other campus and professional activities are you involved in? Include any officer/leadership positions you hold.

I'm part of TV2 as Tech Crew and as a Talent. Also, I'm the Initiate Advisor for my fraternity., Phi Sigma Pi.

Share an interesting or fun fact about yourself.

I know 3 languages and I traveled to about 7 countries and I visited 4 states.

Write one sentence about why you love being a part of ASC.

I love to work as an Academic Coach because I can help students who are struggling just like I did during my first year on college. I think it is a good opportunity to give back everything I learned and help others to overcome any difficulties they might be having. Now, I am a tutor too, and I am excited to help more students to understand and succeed in their classes.

Share an interesting or fun fact about yourself.

An interesting fact I have is that I have taken a picture with the Frisco Bowl Trophy. I also have a friend since preschool with the same name as I do, Lauren!

Write one sentence about why you love being a part of ASC.

I am excited to start as a tutor with the ASC as I love watching people grow and learn. Classes can get hard and frustrating, so when I get to see them start to understand the information better, I get a small sense of joy.

What other campus and professional activities are you involved in? Include any officer/leadership positions you hold.

I can still put a foot behind my head.

Write one sentence about why you love being a part of ASC.

I love tutoring in the ASC because I want to meet student curiosity with ample opportunities to learn. These two factors, put together, help students to strive toward their goals.

Blessing Mupinga

I am studying: Aeronautics - Professional Pilot

I started working with ASC in: Spring 2022

My role with ASC: Tutor

What do you want to do after college?

When I grow up, ideally id like to move out of state to become either a corporate or commercial pilot. However, directly after graduation, my dream would be to move down to Columbus and work at NetJets, which is a private jet company, as a private pilot.

What other campus and professional activities are you involved in? Include any officer/leadership positions you hold.

I am in a multitude of clubs: Barefeet Dance Tribe, NEO Impact, NSBE (National Society of Black Engineers), The Navigators, and AAAE (American Association of Airport Executives). Next fall I will also be taking on a leadership opportunity in Kent State's Kupita/Transciones program. This is a cultural orientation/transition experience for incoming African American, Latinx, Hispanic, Native American, and Multiracial students into the University. So my job is to help mentor these students.

Share an interesting or fun fact about yourself.

I was born with 12 fingers

Write one sentence about why you love being a part of ASC.

n/a (haven't started yet)

Marceline Myers

I am studying: Physics major

I started working with ASC in: Fall 2021

My role with ASC: Tutor

What do you want to do after college?

I want to be in physics research and work with new equations that can help us better understand the natural laws around us. I'm happy wherever I end up (probably as a prof), as long as I get to work on my own projects that make me swoon.

What other campus and professional activities are you involved in? Include any officer/leadership positions you hold.

I commute from afar to campus, so not really anything else.

Share an interesting or fun fact about yourself.

I'm a certified welder.

Write one sentence about why you love being a part of ASC.

I think it will be a wonderful opportunity to work with others and expand on my own knowledge of mathematics.

I am studying: Political Science major, Italian Studies minor and working on TEFL certificate

I started working with ASC in: Spring 2022

My role with ASC: Tutor

What do you want to do after college?

I am still fully working this part out, but no matter what happens, I want to work with humanitarian organizations in Italy to help provide support for immigrants coming to the country. My aim is to become a human rights lawyer by 2032 so that I can further my work with these organizations and provide English classes for all those who want to learn it.

What other campus and professional activities are you involved in? Include any officer/leadership positions you hold.

My role with ASC: Tutor, Classroom Assistant

What do you want to do after college?

When I grow up I want to become a successful Nurse Practitioner. I would love to land a job at Cleveland Clinic right after college and gain residency there before I go back to school for my Master's degree.

What other campus and professional activities are you involved in? Include any officer/leadership positions you hold.

As of Fall 2021, I am involved in Movers and Groovers. In the Spring of 2021, I also took part in some intramural sports as well as Freedom Paws.

My favorite place to vacation is Frankfort, Michigan!

Write one sentence about why you love being a part of ASC.

I want to make a difference in student's academic lives, especially when I am able to teach about subjects I love.

Jordan Solmen

I am studying: Major: Chemistry, Minor: Spanish

I started working with ASC in: Fall 2021

My role with ASC: Tutor

What do you want to do after college?

As of right now, I am considering going to graduate school after college to further study some area of Chemistry. I love explaining concepts, so lately I have thought about pursuing a career as a professor.

What other campus and professional activities are you involved in? Include any officer/leadership positions you hold.

I am currently the treasurer and secretary of Tau Beta Sigma, an honorary band sorority. This semester, I also hope to become more involved in Kent's LGBTQ+ Center.

Share an interesting or fun fact about yourself.

I was once ranked about 10th place nationally in Minecraft Survival Games. Around the same time, I lead the LifeBoat Survival Games daily leaderboard in 1st out of 43,284 players.

Write one sentence about why you love being a part of ASC.

I love working as a tutor in the ASC because the only reason I am where I am now is because of the guidance I was given in difficult classes in the past, and I love having the opportunity to provide that same mentorship for other students.
